title: Girls' Love Story
overview: Four women are ready to take their relationships to the next level and prepare to move in with their boyfriends. The only problem is, they're all dating the same man- and come moving day, he's nowhere to be found! Meet Sweet Beauty, Sexy Eater, Innocent Drinker, and Loyal Cry Baby, four vivacious fitness trainers now hell-bent on revenge against the man who stole their money and trust in the opposite sex.
